_comment: Task metadata extracted from CCP4 CachedLookups.json. Contains TASKTITLE, DESCRIPTION, MAINTAINER, shortTitle for UI display.
_architecture_note: CCP4i2 has a GUI/Plugin split: CTaskWidget (GUI) classes define TASKMODULE, DESCRIPTION, and reference a CPluginScript via TASKNAME. Multiple GUIs can reference the same plugin (one-to-many). This file currently captures a flattened view (one entry per plugin).
_todo: FUTURE: Parse GUI classes (*_gui.py, CTask*.py) without importing Qt. Extract TASKNAME to link GUIâ†’Plugin. Support multiple GUI entries per plugin for different use cases/folders.

AMPLE.TASKTITLE: Molecular Replacement with unconventional models - AMPLE
AMPLE.DESCRIPTION: This task is for running Molecular Replacement with unconventional models

AUSPEX.DESCRIPTION: Use AUSPEX, generate graphical diagnostics for data set

AlternativeImportXIA2.DESCRIPTION: Harvest merged and unmerged files from selected XIA2 data reduction protocols

LidiaAcedrg.DESCRIPTION: Generate a PDB file and dictionary (acedrg) from MOL file, SMILES, or sketch (lidia)

LidiaAcedrgNew.DESCRIPTION:
Generate a PDB file and dictionary (acedrg) from MOL file, SMILES string/file, or sketch (lidia).
Optionally match atom names to known structures.

MakeLink.DESCRIPTION: Generate a link dictionary to describe a covalent bond between two monomers, allowing modification of the linked monomers

MakeMonster.DESCRIPTION: Build an MTZ file from data objects

MakeProjectsAndDoLigandPipeline.TASKTITLE: Make projects and do ligand pipeline
MakeProjectsAndDoLigandPipeline.DESCRIPTION: A task to generate projects and apply ligand pipeline for multiple datasets
MakeProjectsAndDoLigandPipeline.shortTitle: Make projects and do ligand pipeline

ProvideAlignment.DESCRIPTION: Enter an alignment from a file or by cut and paste

ProvideAsuContents.DESCRIPTION: Define AU contents, estimate molecular weight, Matthews probability from list of sequences

ProvideSequence.DESCRIPTION: Enter one or more sequences from a sequence file, from a PDB, or by cut and paste

ProvideTLS.TASKTITLE: Import and/or edit TLS set definitions
ProvideTLS.DESCRIPTION: Enter TLS information to be used later in the project

SIMBAD.DESCRIPTION: This task is for running Molecular Replacement without a sequence

ShelxCE.TASKTITLE: Experimental phasing from heavy atom sites with ShelxE

SubstituteLigand.TASKTITLE: Automated solution of isomorphous ligand complex
SubstituteLigand.DESCRIPTION: A ligand workflow, starting from merged or unmerged reflections, SMILES, and an isomorphous parent structure

SubtractNative.TASKTITLE: Subtract a defied fraction of an atom map from an input map
SubtractNative.DESCRIPTION: Reads a set of map coefficients, generates a corresponding map, and modifies it by subtracting some fraction of the FC map corresponding to a set of coordinates that have been provided. The output is a set of modified map coefficients

TestObsConversions.DESCRIPTION: Exercise CCP4i2 Observed data representation conversions

acorn.TASKTITLE: ACORN - Phase Refinement with Dynamic Density Modification
acorn.DESCRIPTION: Un-biased improvement of initial phases for high resolution data (1.5 Angstoms and better)

add_fractional_coords.DESCRIPTION: Calculate fractional coordinates and output them in mmCIF format

adding_stats_to_mmcif_i2.TASKTITLE: Prepare and validate files for deposition
adding_stats_to_mmcif_i2.DESCRIPTION: Add data reduction statistics and sequence information into coordinates for deposition

aimless_pipe.DESCRIPTION: Scale and analyse unmerged data and suggest space group (Pointless, Aimless, Ctruncate, FreeRflag)

arcimboldo.TASKTITLE: Ab initio phasing and chain tracing - ARCIMBOLDO (LITE, BORGES, SHREDDER)
arcimboldo.DESCRIPTION: Structure solution from ideal molecular fragments using PHASER and SHELXE

buster.DESCRIPTION: Refine (BUSTER, Global Phasing Limited) with optional solvent/water update

ccp4mg_edit_model.TASKTITLE: Interactive model preparation - CCP4mg and MrBUMP
ccp4mg_edit_model.DESCRIPTION: Identify MR models with MrBUMP, display and select with CCP4mg

ccp4mg_edit_nomrbump.TASKTITLE: Interactive selection of MR model components - CCP4mg
ccp4mg_edit_nomrbump.DESCRIPTION: Use CCP4mg to select components of a search model and output to i2 for MR

ccp4mg_general.TASKTITLE: Molecular graphics visualization and figure creation - CCP4MG
ccp4mg_general.DESCRIPTION: Interactive molecular graphics: visualization, figure preparation, analysis.

chainsaw.DESCRIPTION: Truncate and renumber model prior to molecular replacement

chltofom.TASKTITLE: Convert HL phase to and from Phi/Fom
chltofom.DESCRIPTION: Interconvert phases between Hendrickson Lattman and Phi/FOM representation
chltofom.shortTitle: Convert HL phase to and from Phi/Fom

cif2mtz.DESCRIPTION: Import merged mmCIF X-ray data e.g. from the PDB database

cmapcoeff.DESCRIPTION: Compute map coefficients from set of observations and phases (cmapcoeff)

comit.TASKTITLE: Calculate omit map to reduce model bias after molecular replacement or for validation
comit.DESCRIPTION: Calculate omit map to reduce model bias

coordinate_selector.TASKTITLE: Import a coordinate set - optional selection of subset
coordinate_selector.DESCRIPTION: Select (potentially complicated) subset from a coordinate set

coot_find_waters.DESCRIPTION: Find and filter waters based on electron density and contacts (non-interactive Coot)

coot_rsr_morph.TASKTITLE: Real space refinement morphing with coot
coot_rsr_morph.DESCRIPTION: Real space refinement morphing with coot
coot_rsr_morph.shortTitle: Real space refinement morphing with coot

coot_script_lines.DESCRIPTION: Use scripts to fit sidechains, perform stepped refinement, fill and fit... (non-interactive Coot)

crank2.TASKTITLE: Automated structure solution - CRANK2 phasing and building

crank2_faest.DESCRIPTION: Crank2 FA estimation and other phasing preparations

crank2_phdmmb.DESCRIPTION: SHELXE density modification and poly-Ala tracing

csymmatch.DESCRIPTION: Match symmetry and origin of output model to reference structure (Csymmatch)

ctruncate.DESCRIPTION: Convert reflection intensities to structure factors (ctruncate)

density_calculator.DESCRIPTION: Calculate a map for a structure

dr_mr_modelbuild_pipeline.TASKTITLE: Data Reduction, MR, Model build pipeline
dr_mr_modelbuild_pipeline.DESCRIPTION: Data Reduction, MR, Model build pipeline

dummy.DESCRIPTION: Demo code for developers - does not run

editbfac.DESCRIPTION: Process Predicted Models - automatically process predicted models

edstats.TASKTITLE: Analyse agreement between model and density - EDSTATS
edstats.DESCRIPTION: Calculates real-space metrics for evaluating the agreement between model and density (Edstats, cfft)

findmyseq.DESCRIPTION: Find the most likely sequence in a database for a given map and model

freerflag.DESCRIPTION: Generate a Free R set for a complete set of reflection indices to a given resolution (FreeRflag)

gesamt.DESCRIPTION: Superpose one protein structure on another

i2Dimple.TASKTITLE: DIMPLE - Simple reflections + coordinates to map pipeline
i2Dimple.DESCRIPTION: This task uses the DIMPLE pipeline to generate maps for a new dataset, provided a possible starting model is available.  For simple cases of isomorphous data, the pipeline will use rigid body refinement in REFMAC to 'tweak' the starting model. Where unit cells are incompatible, it will attempt automated molecular replacement.

import_merged.DESCRIPTION: Import reflection data in any format, report on contents and create CCP4i2 data objects

import_mosflm.DESCRIPTION: Import merged and unmerged X-ray reflections from Mosflm

lorestr_i2.DESCRIPTION: Automated Low Resolution Structure Refinement Pipeline (LORESTR)

matthews.DESCRIPTION: Estimate number of molecules in the asymmetric unit and solvent content (Matthews_coeff)

mergeMtz.TASKTITLE: Merge experimental data objects to MTZ

modelcraft.TASKTITLE: Autobuild with ModelCraft, Buccaneer and Nautilus
modelcraft.DESCRIPTION: Automated model building of protein, nucleic acid and water

molrep_den.TASKTITLE: Molecular replacement with electron density - MOLREP
molrep_den.DESCRIPTION: Use electron density as the search model (Molrep)

molrep_selfrot.DESCRIPTION: Evaluate data for anisotropy, optical resolution, pseudo translation and perform self-rotation function (Molrep)

morda_i2.DESCRIPTION: Molecular Replacement with Domains and Assemblies

mosflm.DESCRIPTION: Use a script that you provide

mrbump_basic.DESCRIPTION: Run a quick MrBUMP job with streamlined settings

mrbump_model_prep.DESCRIPTION: Model preparation with MrBUMP for data reduction/MR/model build pipeline

mrparse.DESCRIPTION: Search online PDB and EBI-AFDB databases to find and process search models for use in molecular replacement

pdb_redo_api.DESCRIPTION: Refine structures using PDB-REDO Web service

pdbset_ui.DESCRIPTION: Structure edits with the pdbset program

pdbview_edit.DESCRIPTION: Edit PDB/CIF files by hand with the PdbView program

phaser_EP.DESCRIPTION: Complete a heavy atom model and calculate phases

phaser_EP_AUTO.TASKTITLE: SAD phasing from heavy atom sites - PHASER
phaser_EP_AUTO.DESCRIPTION: Complete a heavy atom model and calculate phases
phaser_EP_AUTO.shortTitle: SAD phasing from heavy atom sites - PHASER

phaser_EP_LLG.DESCRIPTION: Calculate anomalous LLG map phased by coordinates to highlight anomalous scatterers (Phaser)

phaser_MR_RNP.DESCRIPTION: Rigid body refinement usng PHASER in MR_RNP mode

phaser_ensembler.DESCRIPTION: Compile assorted related structures into an ensemble for use in PHASER

phaser_pipeline.DESCRIPTION: Advanced MR options followed by refinement and rebuilding (Phaser, Refmac5, Coot)

phaser_rnp_pipeline.DESCRIPTION: Define rigid bodies for refinement (Phaser), fill partial residues (Coot) and refine (Refmac)

phaser_simple.DESCRIPTION: Simple MR with optional refinement and rebuilding (Phaser)

phaser_singleMR.DESCRIPTION: Perform Single Atom MR using Phaser

pisapipe.DESCRIPTION: Analyse tertiary structure and interfaces of a protein

pointless_reindexToMatch.DESCRIPTION: Reindex: match to reference data/coordinates; change space group; analyse symmetry; or expand to P1 (Pointless)

privateer.DESCRIPTION: Validation, re-refinement and graphical analysis of carbohydrate structures

prosmart.TASKTITLE: ProSMART - Restraint generation and structural comparison
prosmart.shortTitle: ProSMART - Restraint generation and structural comparison

qtpisa.TASKTITLE: Interface and quaternary structure analysis - PISA

reindex_processed_data.DESCRIPTION: Reindex processed data to correspond to a master dataset (Reindex)

scaleit.DESCRIPTION: Compare two or more datasets by running SCALEIT

sculptor.DESCRIPTION: Truncate model prior to molecular replacement

servalcat_pipe.DESCRIPTION: Refinement against diffraction data or cryo-EM SPA map with optional restraints from ProSmart and/or MetalCoord

sheetbend.TASKTITLE: Fast preliminary refinement of atomic model coordinates or temperature factors, including at low resolution
sheetbend.DESCRIPTION: Fast preliminary refinement of atomic model using the program sheetbend

shelx.TASKTITLE: Automated structure solution - SHELXC/D/E phasing and building
shelx.DESCRIPTION: Experimental phasing pipeline SHELX (run via Crank2)

shelxeMR.TASKTITLE: Model building from Molecular Replacement solution using Shelxe
shelxeMR.DESCRIPTION: Use Shelxe to attempt to improve (or verify) a solution from Molecular Replacement

slicendice.TASKTITLE: SliceNDice - Auto model processing and MR
slicendice.DESCRIPTION: Automated processing of predicted or deposited search models and Molecular Replacement
slicendice.shortTitle: SliceNDice - Auto model processing and MR

splitMtz.TASKTITLE: Import and Split MTZ into experimental data objects
splitMtz.DESCRIPTION: Select groups of columns from the MTZ file (csplitmtz)

validate_protein.DESCRIPTION: Calculates per-residue metrics including B-factors, density fit quality, Ramachandran plots, rotamer outliers, and clashes (Iris-Validation & MolProbity)

xia2_dials.TASKTITLE: Automated integration of images with DIALS using xia2
xia2_dials.DESCRIPTION: Select a directory containing images and integrate them

xia2_multiplex.TASKTITLE: Automated combination of datasets using xia2.multiplex

xia2_ssx_reduce.TASKTITLE: Reduction of serial datasets using xia2.ssx_reduce
xia2_ssx_reduce.DESCRIPTION: Select integrated data from xia2.ssx or dials.stills_process

xia2_xds.TASKTITLE: Automated integration of images with XDS using xia2
xia2_xds.DESCRIPTION: Select a directory containing images and integrate them
